edu.umn.cs.spatialHadoop.mapred

Interface BlockFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CombineBlockFilter, ConvexHull.ConvexHullFilter, DefaultBlockFilter, DistributedJoin.SpatialJoinFilter, RangeFilter, Skyline.SkylineFilter

    public interface BlockFilter
    An interface for filtering blocks before running map tasks.
    Author:
    Ahmed Eldawy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Configure the block filter the first time it is created.
      void selectCellPairs(GlobalIndex<Partition> gIndex1, GlobalIndex<Partition> gIndex2, ResultCollector2<Partition,Partition> output)
      Selects block pairs that need to be processed together by a binary MapReduce job.
      void selectCells(GlobalIndex<Partition> gIndex, ResultCollector<Partition> output)
      Selects the blocks that need to be processed b a MapReduce job.

      • selectCellPairs

        void selectCellPairs(GlobalIndex<Partition> gIndex1,
                   GlobalIndex<Partition> gIndex2,
                   ResultCollector2<Partition,Partition> output)
        Selects block pairs that need to be processed together by a binary MapReduce job. A binary MapReduce job is a job that deals with two input files that need to be processed together (e.g., spatial join).
        Parameters:
        gIndex1 -
        gIndex2 -
